item.description:
Thursday, January 21, 2010
Transgender Equality Lobby Day
Sponsored by the Massachusetts Transgender Political Coalition (MTPC)

2 - 5 pm in Nurses Hall at the Massachusetts State House Beacon St., Boston - near Park St Station on the Green Line

We must continue to educate our legislators about why this bill is needed now. We need to continue to be visible and for our family, friends, and allies to be visible and stand up with us. We had 300 people lobbying last April, lets double that number. Even if you legislator is a co-sponsor come in and help others to lobby.

Please call now and make appointments to meet with your State Representative and Senator on 1/21/09. To find out who your legislators are go to http://www.wheredoivo... Nervous about calling? Check out our calling script at http://www.masstpc.or...

All the necessary materials and lobbying training will be provided. For more information or assistance with locating your legislators contact MTPC at info@masstpc.org or 617-778-0519. For more info on H1728/S1687 “An Act Relative to Gender-Based Discrimination and Hate Crimes” see http://www.masstpc.or... Please RSVP to Jesseb@masstpc.org at MTPC so we know how many people to expect. This event is sponsored by the Massachusetts Transgender Political Coalition (MTPC) and co-sponsored by a growing list of LGBT and progressive organizations.

Free Lobbying Training Next Week
Need a refresher or have never lobbied your legislator in person? Come by one of MTPC's general meetings in either Worcester or Boston where we will be giving a lobbying training for the upcoming Trans Equality Lobbying Day. Materials and practice time will be provided.

Worcester Chapter - Sunday, January 10, 2010
2-4p at APW, 85 Green Street, Worcester

Boston Chapter - Monday, January 11, 2010
7-8p at 14 Beacon St, Boston, MA 02108


Gunner Scott
Executive Director
Massachusetts Transgender Political Coalition
PO Box 301897, Jamaica Plain, MA 02130
Office: 617-778-0519
http://www.masstpc.or...

group.who: Friends of the Boston Dyke March
group.name: The Boston Dyke March

item.name: Transgender Equality Lobby Day
